acceptanceCriteria: The prompt heading text renders exactly as: "Will you be my Valentine, Sunidhi?"

constraints: Do not change any of the existing Yes/No interaction behavior ("No" must remain evasive on hover/pointer/touch; "Yes" must reveal the celebratory view).

Change the "Yes" button label or add emojis/extra words to the "Yes"/"No" button labels.

Generate new meme images or change the existing meme asset path unless explicitly requested.
